text: Bar akongezir arazir kam, ten bizim? A gumazir uan mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghorezibar bizimra? O, gumazir mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghorezir puvatɨziba uaghan, men bizim? Ia deravɨra nɨghnɨgh. E kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Abraham nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itima, God an nɨghnɨzir gavgavim bagha a dɨbora ghaze, nɨ nan damazimɨn dera.”
